metadata.description: This flow HTTP trigger URL. Enter space character ( ) for none. Filled automatically.
Required. Org Name orgname (this is the prefix of the auto assigned domain orgname.onmicrosoft.com)
Required. Org Domain name such as orgname.onmicrosoft.com or orgname.com
Service Principal Id for Graph Api. Enter space character ( ) for none. Filled automatically.
Service Principal Secret for Graph Api. Enter space character ( ) for none. Filled automatically.
Service Principal Id for Auth Api. Enter space character ( ) for none. Filled automatically.
Service Principal Secret for Auth Api. Enter space character ( ) for none. Filled automatically.
Required. Could have many environments N each with its envN_cycle0 template
Required. Rename cycle to class, for example. So now class1, ... classN

parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Thank you for signing up with WorkSchool 365: Your Market for Learning Reviewers.

However we notice that you did not sucessfully complete the enrollment to start enjoying your WorkSchool 365 app:
  @{variables('email')} @ @{parameters('envpar_config__TenantName (new_envpar_config__TenantName)')}

✓ Click Here To Complete Your Sign-Up...
✓ or Reply To This Email To Get Help.

Thank you for your interest in our solution offer.

-- 
@{parameters('envpar_config__TenantName (new_envpar_config__TenantName)')} @ WorkSchool 365
